data.text:
NAME:
   loop quote in - get a quote for the cost of a loop in swap

USAGE:
   loop quote in amt

DESCRIPTION:
   Allows to determine the cost of a swap up front.Either specify an amount or deposit outpoints.

OPTIONS:

--last_hop string                                        the pubkey of the last hop to use for the quote
   --conf_target uint                                       the target number of blocks the on-chain htlc broadcast by the swap client should confirm within (default: 0)
   --verbose, -v                                            show expanded details (default: false)
   --private                                                generates and passes routehints. Should be used if the connected node is only reachable via private channels (default: false)
   --route_hints string [ --route_hints string ]

route hints that can each be individually used to assist in reaching the invoice's destination
   --deposit_outpoint string [ --deposit_outpoint string ]  one or more static address deposit outpoints to quote for. Deposit outpoints are not to be used in combination with an amount. Eachadditional outpoint can be added by specifying --deposit_outpoint tx_id:idx
